segments.text: I can clearly see the "COOKIE JAR" in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filled to the brim with delicious-looking cookies, a real temptation for any child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's strategy to get to them is quite audacious, I must say.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Climbing that wobbly stool, reaching with one hand while holding a plate â€“ he's determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister's expectant face is priceless, her hand already out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together, a tiny, covert team of snack thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, utterly absorbed in her dish-drying, has no idea what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic scene of childhood rebellion and the pursuit of sweet delights.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost want to cheer them on, despite the danger of the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The joy of a stolen cookie is probably unmatched for a child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've chosen their moment well, with the adult completely distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet those cookies will taste extra good because they're forbidden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little secret will be their triumph, at least until they're caught.
segments.speaker: PAR
